text: I cannot say what I expect we’ll see amongst this hazy darkness.
In truth, this is a journey for the sake of a journey. All we can learn is how far we can go; and we may take the answer to our graves.
Our descent is ever so gradual. It’s as though we are suspended in a surreal moment. Surreal but beautiful, such an expanse of nothingness is.

I trust my colleague with everything, as I hope he does me. If at any moment the walls around us give in to the pressure, we will vanish in a fraction of a moment. All I can do is hope and pray that some valuable lesson might be salvaged from such carnage.
